    Glimpse into my Garden

    A lil journey through the species in my Garden

    Flowers are the way to a woman’s heart.

    Well, that might not be the reason we've maintained this garden. hehe, noticed the "We" ? Our garden is technically maintained by my Mom, who loves gardening. She doesn't always favour colorful plants or the flowering variety but also a whole world of veggies and so on. "Psst... Son don't mention the Coffea we have in our backyard, Its not that much. Haha, I'll think about it Mom... Anyways, we'll take a look at some of the species we have out in our frontyard.
